item.description:
***Please note: By popular demand I will now post a semi-detailed description of things covered during each session.

Ease your mind
Calm your body
Increase your creativity
And sense of well being...

The benefits of relaxation may include improved health, well being and overall happiness. Use this opportunity to practice most common relaxation exercises in a warm, supportive group atmosphere.

This week's topic: Body awareness and muscle relaxation.

We will start with a short mindfulness exercise that will ask you to become aware of sensations within your body. The rest of the session will focus on Autogenic Training. It is a deeply relaxing technique that is great for relieving pain, tension and even sleep problems!
item.name: Body Awareness and Muscle Relaxation
